mutants.code:
import re

def is_anagram(string1, string2):
    string1 = re.sub('[^A-Za-z]+', '', string1)
    string2 = re.sub('[^A-Za-z]+', '', string2)
    string1 = string1.encode('utf-8')
    string2 = string2.encode('utf-8')
    sorted_string1 = sorted(string1)
    sorted_string2 = sorted(string2)
    return sorted_string1 != sorted_string2

import re

def is_anagram(string1, string2):
    string1 = re.sub('', '', string1)
    string2 = re.sub('[^A-Za-z]+', '', string2)
    string1 = string1.encode('utf-8')
    string2 = string2.encode('utf-8')
    sorted_string1 = sorted(string1)
    sorted_string2 = sorted(string2)
    return sorted_string1 == sorted_string2

import re

def is_anagram(string1, string2):
    string1 = re.sub('[^A-Za-z]+', 'MUTATED', string1)
    string2 = re.sub('[^A-Za-z]+', '', string2)
    string1 = string1.encode('utf-8')
    string2 = string2.encode('utf-8')
    sorted_string1 = sorted(string1)
    sorted_string2 = sorted(string2)
    return sorted_string1 == sorted_string2

import re

def is_anagram(string1, string2):
    string1 = re.sub('[^A-Za-z]+', '', string1)
    string2 = re.sub('[^A-Za-z]+', '', string2)
    string1 = string1.encode('')
    string2 = string2.encode('utf-8')
    sorted_string1 = sorted(string1)
    sorted_string2 = sorted(string2)
    return sorted_string1 == sorted_string2

import re

def is_anagram(string1, string2):
    string1 = re.sub('[^A-Za-z]+', '', string1)
    string2 = re.sub('[^A-Za-z]+', '', string2)
    string1 = string1.encode('utf-8')
    string2 = string2.encode('')
    sorted_string1 = sorted(string1)
    sorted_string2 = sorted(string2)
    return sorted_string1 == sorted_string2
